x_highlights.text: GPT-4o was OpenAI's multimodal model from 2024, praised for its warm, engaging style. It was retired in ChatGPT on Feb 13, 2026.
x_highlights.author: Grok

x_highlights.text: OpenAI has released GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark, a smaller, ultra-fast coding model powered by Cerebras hardware. Over 1,000 tokens per second.
x_highlights.author: Marius Fanu

x_highlights.text: Pentagon used Anthropic's Claude AI in the military operation to capture Nicolas Maduro, via a partnership with Palantir.
x_highlights.author: disclosetv / WSJ

x_highlights.text: MiniMax M2.5: 230B MoE, 80.2% SWE-Bench, $1/hour. The unit economics are insane.
x_highlights.author: GongDao

x_highlights.text: Three frontier open-source models from China in one weekâ€”MiniMax M2.5, Kimi K2.5, GLM-5â€”at 3-20x cheaper than US counterparts.
x_highlights.author: Manny

x_highlights.text: Kimi K2.5 dominates OpenRouter paid calls ranking, far ahead of other models.
x_highlights.author: è“ç‚¹ç½‘

x_highlights.text: Anthropic's $30B funding at $380B valuationâ€”annualized revenue $14B, 10x growth each year for past 3 years.
x_highlights.author: Anthropic

x_highlights.text: Google DeepMind upgraded Gemini 3 Deep Thinkâ€”solved 18 previously unsolved research problems across math, physics, CS.
x_highlights.author: Asteris AI

x_highlights.text: If you used ChatGPT today, you might not have noticedâ€”but GPT-4o is gone. GPT-5.2 is now the default.
x_highlights.author: Shubham Sharma

x_highlights.text: GLM-5 vs Kimi K2.5: Both 1T+ param MoE models from China, 14 days apart. GLM-5 trained on 100K Huawei Ascend chipsâ€”zero NVIDIA.
x_highlights.author: BruceBlue
